# Course Types & Structural Defaults

## Full‑Course (8–12 weeks)
- Weekly sessions, homework, module assessments, capstone
- Recommended: L1/L2 per lesson, L3 per module, L4 at end

## Workshop (1–2 days)
- Intensive practice, fewer concepts, more hands‑on
- Recommended: frequent L1 checks, one L2 or mini‑project

## Webinar (60–120 min)
- Focused topic; takeaway cheatsheet; demo-driven
- Recommended: L1 pulse checks, optional L2 follow‑up task

## Microlearning (5–20 min units)
- Single concept; mobile‑friendly; immediate practice
- Recommended: single L1 check; optional L2 micro‑task
